patthana23.49:1.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho sekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana23.49:2.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naasekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho asekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana23.49:3.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nanevasekkhanāsekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekavīsa, adhipatiyā ekavīsa …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
